story.title: Who are we?
story.subtitle: A family story of neurodivergence, passion, and innovation
story.p1: My name is Jay, and I'm developing Shinkofa with my partner Angelique. We are a family of 6 (2 parents + 4 children), all neuroatypical. This project is our passion but also our main source of income.
story.p2: As a Splenic Projector 1/3, multipotentialite Gifted individual, I created Shinkofa because I needed a tool that truly understands my unique functioning. If this project resonates with you, it's probably because you too function differently.
story.p3: We believe in diversifying income sources: your subscriptions fund feature development, but your donations allow us to take creative risks, experiment, and add bold features.

step1.title: Complete the Questionnaire
step1.description: 155 holistic questions (~1h) to identify your unique profile: energy, cognition, neurodivergence, values. You can save your progress and come back later.

step2.title: Join the Community
step2.description: Share your experiences, help other neurodivergent individuals and co-create the ecosystem on Telegram.

step3.title: Access the Ecosystem
step3.description: Priority beta testers: early access to tools (AI Companion, Planner, Creative Suite).

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started

q1.question: Is Shinkofa truly adapted for neurodivergent individuals?
q1.answer: Absolutely. Shinkofa was created BY a neurodivergent person who has been coaching for almost 15 years and is passionate about understanding humans. Jay (Splenic Projector 1/3, multipotentialite Gifted) created Shinkofa FOR neurodivergent individuals. Our entire family of 6 is neuroatypical. We live the challenges you face daily. Every feature is designed to respect your energy cycles, cognitive overload, and unique functioning.

q2.question: I don't have time to answer 155 questions...
q2.answer: We understand. The full questionnaire takes about 1 hour. But you can do it in multiple sessions: the questionnaire automatically saves your progress. You're not required to complete everything in one sitting. And this hour will help you better understand yourself for YEARS. A minimal investment for maximum impact.

q3.question: Is my data secure?
q3.answer: Yes, 100%. Your data belongs to you. European hosting (GDPR compliant), end-to-end encryption. Your data will never be sold or used for commercial purposes. IF this rule changes, all users will be notified and it will only be done with explicit user consent. You can export or delete your data at any time. We respect your digital sovereignty.

q4.question: Why pay when free apps exist?
q4.answer: Free apps sell your data or flood you with ads. Shinkofa is ethical: your subscription funds feature development, not the resale of your personal information. We believe in a transparent model: you pay for quality service, not to be the product. On The Shinkofa Way, the user will never be the product, they will be recognized for their individuality.

q5.question: When will the complete ecosystem be available?
q5.answer: Shinkofa is in active development. The holistic questionnaire is already functional. The Shizen AI and Intelligent Planner are arriving progressively. By signing up now, you become a priority beta tester and influence development. Alpha Pioneers will have early access to all features.

q6.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
q6.answer: 30-day money-back guarantee. If Shinkofa doesn't suit you, we'll fully refund you, no questions asked. We want you to be fully convinced of the value of our ecosystem.

q1.question: What's the difference between Telegram and Discord?
q1.answer: Telegram is more informal and active daily (spontaneous discussions, quick shares). Discord is structured into themed channels, ideal for events and organized support.

q2.question: How long to receive a response?
q2.answer: Contact form: within 48 hours on weekdays. Communities: often in a few minutes/hours thanks to community mutual aid.

q3.question: Is my contact information secure?
q3.answer: Yes! All data is encrypted and GDPR compliant. We never use your contact information for commercial purposes.

q4.question: Do I need to subscribe to join the community?
q4.answer: No! Access to Telegram and Discord communities is 100% free for everyone.

senseiFamily.name: Sensei Family

features.includesSensei: Everything in Sensei for 5 VIP profiles

legend.label: Legend:
legend.text: Alpha Pioneer prices shown (-25%). Standard prices in parentheses.

pioneer.question: How does the Alpha Pioneer offer work?
pioneer.answer: The first 100 subscribers get -25% for LIFE on their subscription. This price stays locked even if rates increase. The offer is valid from January 20 to February 3, 2026.

annual.question: Is there a discount for annual subscriptions?
annual.answer: Yes! Annual subscriptions include 2 free months. Combined with the Alpha Pioneer offer, you save up to 40% compared to the standard monthly rate.

family.question: How does the Family plan work?
family.answer: Family plans allow you to create up to 5 independent profiles with their own questionnaires and data. Ideal for couples, families, or neuroatypical roommates.

senseiVsSamurai.question: What's the difference between Samurai and Sensei?
senseiVsSamurai.answer: Sensei offers unlimited Shizen AI (vs 200 messages), creative tools (dictation, video), live sessions with Jay, and VIP 1-to-1 support. It's the premium experience for those who want to maximize their transformation.

changePlan.question: Can I change plans?
changePlan.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Adjustments are prorated based on your current billing period.

manual.question: Is the Holistic Manual included in subscriptions?
manual.answer: No, it's a separate purchase. But subscribers get a discount: -30% for Samurai and Samurai Family, -50% for Sensei and Sensei Family.

liability.disclaimer: Important disclaimer: Shinkofa is not a medical service. The tools offered are designed for personal support and well-being, but in no way replace professional medical diagnosis or treatment. Always consult a healthcare professional for medical questions.

links.title: 5. Hyperlinks
links.content: Hyperlinks set up on this website to other resources on the Internet cannot engage the responsibility of The Shinkofa Way.

law.title: 6. Applicable Law
law.content: This website and the terms of use are governed by Spanish and European law. In case of dispute, Spanish courts have jurisdiction.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: The Shinkofa Way is committed to protecting the confidentiality and security of your personal data. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacy.commitment: Fundamental commitment: Your data will NEVER be sold or used for commercial purposes. IF this rule changes, all users will be notified and it will only be done with your explicit consent.

data.title: 2. Personal Data Collected
data.intro: We collect the following types of data:
data.identificationDesc: Last name, first name, email address
data.profileDesc: Responses to the holistic questionnaire (155 questions about your energy, cognition, neurodivergence, values)
data.usageDesc: Usage history of tools (Planner, Shizen AI, etc.)
data.technicalDesc: IP address, browser type, pages visited, session duration
data.paymentDesc: Processed by our secure payment provider (Stripe), we do not store your bank details

purposes.title: 3. Purposes of Processing
purposes.intro: Your data is used only for:
purposes.purpose1: Creating and managing your user account
purposes.purpose2: Generating your personalized holistic profile based on your questionnaire responses
purposes.purpose3: Adapting Shizen AI and the Intelligent Planner to your unique profile (neurodivergence, energy, cycles)
purposes.purpose4: Providing you access to Shinkofa ecosystem tools
purposes.purpose5: Processing your payments and managing your subscription
purposes.purpose7: Improving our services (anonymized statistical analysis only)

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: We process your data based on:
legalBasis.consentDesc: When creating your account and responding to the questionnaire
legalBasis.contractDesc: Providing the services you have subscribed to
legalBasis.legalDesc: Retention of certain data to meet accounting and tax obligations

retention.title: 5. Data Retention Period
retention.profileDesc: Retained as long as your account is active
retention.paymentDesc: Retained in accordance with legal obligations (10 years)
retention.technicalDesc: Retained for a maximum of 13 months
retention.deletionDesc: All your personal data is deleted within 30 days (except for legal obligations)

security.title: 6. Security of Your Data
security.intro: We implement the following security measures:
security.hostingDesc: OVH servers located in France, GDPR compliant
security.encryptionDesc: HTTPS/SSL connections, encryption of sensitive data in the database
security.accessDesc: Only authorized administrators can access data (minimum necessary)

sharing.title: 7. Sharing Your Data
sharing.noSale: We NEVER sell your data to third parties.
sharing.intro: Your data may only be shared with:
sharing.paymentDesc: To process transactions (they only receive data necessary for payment)
sharing.legalDesc: If required by law or judicial authority
sharing.noMarketing: No marketing, advertising, or commercial partner has access to your data.

rights.title: 8. Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.intro: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.accessDesc: Obtain a copy of all your personal data
rights.rectificationDesc: Correct your inaccurate or incomplete data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten"):
rights.erasureDesc: Delete your account and all your data
rights.portabilityDesc: Receive your data in a structured format (JSON, CSV)
rights.oppositionDesc: Object to the processing of certain data
rights.limitationDesc: Request restriction of processing of your data
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at
rights.cnil: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the CNIL (Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertes):

cookies.title: 9. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.functionalDesc: Saving your progress in the questionnaire
cookies.noAds: We do NOT use advertising cookies, third-party tracking, or marketing cookies.
cookies.browser: You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, but this may affect certain site features.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. In case of substantial modification, you will be informed by email and/or notification on the site.
changes.acceptance: Continued use of the service after notification constitutes acceptance of the new policy.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.intro: For any questions regarding this privacy policy:

cgv.title: Terms of Service
cgv.intro: These Terms of Service (ToS) govern the contractual relationships between The Shinkofa Way and its users in the context of using the services and subscribing to subscriptions on the Shinkofa platform.
cgv.acceptance: By subscribing to a subscription or using our services, you unreservedly accept these Terms of Service.
